entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the morning then rising.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
